articles.author: Toby Lyles, CNN Editorial Research
articles.title: Juneteenth by the Numbers 2021 - CNN
articles.description: Juneteenth is the oldest known US celebration of the end of slavery. African-Americans and others mark the anniversary much like the Fourth of July. Here's a look at Juneteenth, also called Emancipation Day, Freedom Day, Jubilee Day, by the numbers.
